column5: I know Canadian weather is a crap shoot at best. We are going to Birch Lake July 14-20, basically 75 air miles northwest of Ear Falls. 2 years ago we flew about 100 miles northwest of Ear Falls and it was a week later and we froze all week. Should I expect 80's during the day and 50's at night...I know to bring long johns and hooded sweatshirts.....advice welcome.
Bring a set of warm clothes and decent rain gear. You can always shed clothes but you can't put them on if you don't have them.  Good Luck!  Whopper
Check out this link....  Average Weather for Ear Falls by Month  Average high temp is 24C Average low is 12C  Have fun!
